title: Claude Code agent
description:
Implement Claude Code agent backend.

internal/agent/agent.go:
- Agent interface with Run(ctx, prompt, opts) method
- RunOpts: Stream chan, MaxTokens, Timeout
- Result: Output, TokensIn, TokensOut, Cost, Duration

internal/agent/claude.go:
- Invoke: claude --dangerously-skip-permissions --print "<prompt>"
- Capture stdout, parse for token usage if available
- Stream output to channel for real-time display
- Handle timeout via context

Verify: Can invoke claude CLI with a prompt and capture output.
closed_reason: Implemented Agent interface and ClaudeAgent with Run method, streaming support, timeout/cancellation, and token usage parsing
